assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Tomoe Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in chemical, and machinery and equipment businesses in Japan and internationally. It operates through Chemical Products, and Machinery and Equipment divisions. The Chemical Products division imports and sells plastics, industrial chemicals, electronic materials, liqueurs, and other related products for packing/conveyance, adhesion, water sealing/waterproofing, industrial materials, painting, electronic materials/devices, parts, coating, grinding, measurement, jigs/tools, and other applications. The Machinery and Equipment division manufactures and sells solid bowl centrifuges and other related products for wastewater treatment, sludge treatment, food, animal feed, pharmaceuticals, chemistry, recycling, energy, steel making, biology, civil engineering, and architecture industries. Tomoe Engineering Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1941 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
